column5: Beautiful 3 story townhome in Las Colinas next to Lake Carolyn, 15 minutes from DFW and Love Field, 3 blocks from DART that goes to DFW and to all the great places in Downtown Dallas such as restaurants, museums, theater and Deep Ellum. 16 miles to ATT Stadium (Dallas Cowboys) and 18 miles to Texas Rangers. Walking, Running and biking trail across the street. Gorgeous swimming pool with outdoor fireplace and grills.
